title: Unconscionable contract or clause
context: ยง490:2A-302 Title to and possession of goods. Except as otherwise provided in this article, each provision of this article applies whether the lessor or a third party has title to the goods, and whether the lessor, the lessee, or a third party has possession of the goods, notwithstanding any statute or rule of law that possession or the absence of possession is fraudulent. [L 1991, c 40, pt of ยง1]
